title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background enhancements for Teams Rooms on Windows
description: Admins can upload up to 3 images specifying which goes to the left or right room display and console. Higher resolution images (minimum of 1280x800 on console and 1920x1080 on displays) in PNG, JPG, JPEG, and BMP formats are supported. Â This feature available only with the Teams Rooms Pro license.
